alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Camden and southeast Gloucester Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sicklerville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Berlin, Chesilhurst, Atco, Victory Lakes, Sicklerville, Williamstown, Monroe Township, Pine Hill, Folsom and Pine Valley. This includes Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 30 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
